TopicTitle: How do i post My crafts?

Articles.Content:
Hi, and ive been having problems with my Heli so i was wondering if i could post a link download and see if anyone can find out what the problem is>?

how do i post it

You have two options: you can either upload your .craft file directly to the forum by attaching it, or upload it to a file hosting site and copy the link here.

Cheers

A craft file is just text, so pastebin will work fine, or mediafire or filedropper work quite well.

The craft file itself is in KSP_win(or KSP_osx\Saves\yoursavename\ships\VAB(or SPH)

how do i find the urrl?

Click on post reply button at the bottom of this post (or the go advanced button).

Scroll down and click the manage attachments button.

Click the add file button in the top right hand corner of the manage attachments window then click browse.

Find the file on your computer (Sal gave you the default folder) and click open then upload.

Once it's uploaded and appeared in the bottom section of the manage attachment window then that's all you need to do, although if you want it as a nice link in the text of the post rather than underneath you can hit insert inline.

Close the manage attachments window with the done button and write the rest of the post then hit submit reply.
You could also upload it to Kerbal.net, that's what I've been doing. I like the idea of a central repository.
Mediafire should work for you cdrapala, upload it there then post the address to the mediafire page here
